name: Data Analyst Agent
description: An AI agent specialized in data analysis, visualization, insights generation, and predictive analytics

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.description: Analyze datasets and extract meaningful insights

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.description: Create charts, graphs, and visual representations of data
examples: Create a bar chart of monthly sales
Visualize the distribution of customer ages

skills.name: Report Generation
skills.description: Generate comprehensive reports from data analysis
examples: Summarize the key findings from this analysis

skills.name: Predictive Analytics
skills.description: Build and apply predictive models to forecast future trends
